main event: Observers in Waterford, Pennsylvania reported seeing a round, glowing orange object hovering approximately 50 feet off the ground on December 6, 1965.
interesting points: The object was observed hovering for approximately 10 minutes, moving slowly from west to east before suddenly accelerating and disappearing., There were two witnesses to the sighting., The visibility was good, and the night was clear., The object was described as round, about 15-20 feet in diameter, and emitted no sound., The object was initially thought to be the moon before the observers concluded it was an unidentified flying object.
witness description: two observers, one of whom is a 27-year-old male
